name: RWBY Name Generator
description: Unleash your inner Huntsman or Huntress! Craft the perfect RWBY-esque name with our generator. Are you ready to join Team RWBY (or maybe form your own legendary squad)? Let's find out!
introduction: Ever wondered what your name would be if you were a character in the hit anime series RWBY? Now you can! Our RWBY Name Generator combines evocative prefixes and suffixes with a dash of creativity, giving you a name that sounds like it belongs in Remnant. Get ready to face the Grimm!
howToUse: First, take a deep breath... Channel your inner Ruby, Weiss, Blake, or Yang!
Click the 'Generate' button. (It's the one that doesn't explode... hopefully.)
Behold! Your awesome new RWBY name appears!
Don't like it? Keep clicking! We've got more names than there are Grimm in the Emerald Forest. Get creative and find the perfect one!
Share your epic name with your friends! Let them know you're ready for Beacon Academy (or whatever school you prefer).
Remember, the coolest name is the one *you* love! Have fun!

faqs.question: What exactly *is* RWBY?
faqs.answer: RWBY is an American anime-style web series created by Monty Oum for Rooster Teeth. It's about four girls—Ruby, Weiss, Blake, and Yang—who train to become Huntresses at Beacon Academy to protect the world of Remnant from creatures known as the Grimm.

faqs.question: How does the generator work?
faqs.answer: Our generator uses a carefully curated list of prefixes and suffixes inspired by the RWBY universe. It combines them in a way that sounds both unique and fitting for a character in the show. A touch of magic might also be involved... but mostly it's just clever coding!

faqs.question: Can I use these names for my RWBY fan fiction?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Go wild! That's what it's here for. Just remember to give credit where it's due (to the generator, or to the inspiration of RWBY).

faqs.question: Are these names *actually* canon?
faqs.answer: Nope! These are fan-generated names. While we strive for authenticity, these names aren't officially part of the RWBY universe. But hey, maybe Monty Oum would have approved!

faqs.question: I got a really weird name. Is it broken?
faqs.answer: Sometimes, the random generator throws out a curveball. If you get a name that seems a bit... off... just hit the 'Generate' button again. Embrace the chaos, or try again for something a little less unusual!

faqs.question: Can I suggest prefixes and suffixes to add to the generator?
faqs.answer: We'd love to hear your suggestions! Send them our way. We're always looking for ways to improve the generator and make it even more awesome.
